title: No stranger to shutdowns: Trump's history with government closures
shortDescription: The federal government shut down three times during Donald Trump's first term as president, including 35-day closure that is longest in U.S. history.

title: Government shutdown recap: Congress averts shutdown
shortDescription: Congress passed a bipartisan deal spending deal after Donald Trump and Elon Musk tanked an earlier bill. The government did not shut down.

title: Man charged with acting as Chinese agent in California election
shortDescription: Yaoning "Mike" Sun, who served as the campaign manager for a Southern California politician two years ago, was arrested Thursday, prosecutors said.
